title: Jax can block Garen's ult with E

replies.body:
you sure it was his e? did he have a hexdrinker?

edit.: i looked into your match history. the jax built a maw. if he had a hexdrinker at the time you were ulting him, it has probably absorbed the damage.

He did purchase one, but this occured at level 6, before he had even backed. He had only a corruption potion in his inventory.I ulted as he e'd, the damage was completely nullified.

Edit: after that incident, everytime I ulted hex drinker did proc, BUT, if he was e'eing, the magic shield would take no damage. He would also block villain powered ults. Magic shield only takes damage from magic damage. Which means your E deals damage directly to his lifebar. It ignores the magic shield. If someone has 50 HP and a 400 magic shield, he will die to a 50+ damage autoattack or physical spell

Not sure why you mentioned Garen's E, I clearly typed ult. 

Garen's ult is magic damage 80% of the time. 20% of the time it is true damage, via villain mechanic.
